name: CO2 Offset
description: GreenHouseGas/CO2 compensation as a service. Get 1kg/month for free to see how easy it is to implement.

api_methods.name: List existing Compensations
api_methods.description: Returns a list of all existing co2offset certificates linked to account.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all my CO2 offset certificates?
I'd like to see the list of my existing CO2 compensations.
What CO2 offset certificates do I currently have?
Please provide a list of all my CO2 offset certificates.
Show me the CO2 compensations linked to my account.
Could you list all the CO2 offset certificates I have?
I want to check my existing CO2 offset certificates.
List all the CO2 compensations associated with my account.
What are the current CO2 offset certificates under my account?
Can you provide details of my CO2 offset certificates?

api_methods.name: Retrieve Compensation
api_methods.description: Response contains full compensation details (if exists, and owner is account).

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the compensation details for my account with ID 0xF0F2e446EeD32236EA0c78a6E4a91Ed712654799?
I need to check the CO2 offset compensation for the account ID 0xA1B2c3D4e5F67890aBcDeF1234567890aBcDeF12.
What are the compensation details for the account with ID 0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678?
Retrieve the CO2 compensation information for my account ID 0xabcdefabcdefabcdefabcdefabcdefabcdefabcd.
Could you provide the compensation details for the account with ID 0x9876543210fedcba9876543210fedcba98765432?
I want to see the CO2 offset compensation for the account ID 0x0a1b2c3d4e5f67890a1b2c3d4e5f67890a1b2c3d.
Please show me the compensation details for the account with ID 0xabcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12.
Get the CO2 compensation details for my account ID 0x1234abcd5678efgh1234abcd5678efgh1234abcd.
Can you retrieve the compensation information for the account with ID 0xabcdefabcdefabcdefabcdefabcdefabcdef1234?
I need the CO2 offset compensation details for the account ID 0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdefabcdef12.

api_methods.name: Compensate GHG/CO2
api_methods.description:
**Compensate given amount of GHG/CO2eq and provides certificate reference as result.**

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://god.gw.postman.com/run-collection/15081091-09153188-d83e-4c5d-8dd2-e0001ce00582?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D15081091-09153188-d83e-4c5d-8dd2-e0001ce00582%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D81135753-9fec-41b0-9729-da032ac868bd)

utterances.utterance: Can you help me offset my carbon footprint for this month?
I want to compensate for my greenhouse gas emissions. How can I do that?
Please provide a certificate for offsetting 1kg of CO2.
How do I get a certificate for compensating my CO2 emissions?
I need to offset my carbon emissions. Can you assist?
What steps do I need to take to compensate for my greenhouse gas emissions?
Can you issue a certificate for my CO2 compensation?
I would like to see how easy it is to implement CO2 compensation.
Is it possible to get a certificate for offsetting my carbon footprint?
Help me understand how to compensate for my greenhouse gas emissions.
